columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the public ip

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a public ip uniquely

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the public ip

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The resource type of the public ip

columns.name: ddos_custom_policy_id
columns.description: The DDoS custom policy associated with the public IP

columns.name: ddos_settings_protected_ip
columns.description: Indicates whether DDoS protection is enabled on the public IP, or not

columns.name: ddos_settings_protection_coverage
columns.description: The DDoS protection policy customizability of the public IP

columns.name: dns_settings_domain_name_label
columns.description: Contains the domain name label

columns.name: dns_settings_fqdn
columns.description: The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP

columns.name: dns_settings_reverse_fqdn
columns.description: Contains the reverse FQDN

columns.name: idle_timeout_in_minutes
columns.description: The idle timeout of the public IP address

columns.name: ip_address
columns.description: The IP address associated with the public IP address resource

columns.name: ip_configuration_id
columns.description: Contains the IP configuration ID

columns.name: public_ip_address_version
columns.description: Contains the public IP address version

columns.name: public_ip_allocation_method
columns.description: Contains the public IP address allocation method

columns.name: public_ip_prefix_id
columns.description: The Public IP Prefix this Public IP Address should be allocated from

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resource GUID property of the public ip resource

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of a public IP address SKU

columns.name: ip_tags
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the public IP address

columns.name: zones
columns.description: A collection of availability zones denoting the IP allocated for the resource needs to come from
